call_for_papers.description: MPLR accepts three types of submissions: Regular research papers, Work-in-progress research papers, Industry and tool papers. Accepted submissions will be published in the ACM Digital Library, except if the authors prefer not to be included.

conference.description: A premier forum for presenting and discussing novel results in all aspects of managed programming languages and runtime systems.

topics: Managed languages (e.g., Java, Scala, JavaScript, Python, Ruby, C#, F#, Clojure, Groovy, Kotlin, R, Smalltalk, Racket, Rust, Go, Lua, MATLAB, Raku, Pony)
Portable intermediate representations (e.g., JVM, WebAssembly, RPython)
Managed runtime systems (e.g., GraalVM, Android Runtime, V8, JavaScriptCore, .NET)
VMs for mobile and embedded devices
Compiler and program verification and model checking
